TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Cursors extends System.Object
public ref class Cursors abstract sealed

span.span: Defines a set of default cursors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此静态类定义了应用程序通用的一组默认游标。This static class defines a set of default cursors common to applications. 定义游标的各种静态属性不能直接在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，而是通过两种可能的机制间接使用：The various static properties defining cursors are not directly usable in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but are indirectly used through two possible mechanisms: - 类对采用类型的任何属性执行类型转换，以使 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 指定为特性值的枚举的值将计算为静态 属性之一。The class performs type conversion on any [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] attribute that takes type , such that a value of the enumeration specified as the attribute value will evaluate to one of the static properties. - 静态属性值可通过 [X:Static 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension)来使用。A static property value can be used through the [x:Static Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension).

summary.span: 获取应用程序启动时出现的 。

span.span: Gets the that appears when an application is starting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常指示系统正在加载信息，但用户界面可以处理输入。The typically indicates that the system is loading information, but the user interface can handle input. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 请参阅上的注释 。See Remark on .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，当存在上下文相关帮助时，将显示此光标。Typically, this cursor is displayed when context-sensitive help is available. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 请参阅上的注释 。See Remark on .
